split options into On battery and Plugged in sections. Much refactoring, moving code between classes.
finished v 1.2

refactored and changed so as to provide for the new SLS API and automatic 'supported music apps' detection.

comments on how SLS handles passwords
for release 1.2.3

fixed the ClassCastException, some other stuff. ready for 1.2.7

+ strings have been split into separate files
+ Supported apps -> Enabled apps, with more explanation
+ Reworked how the Options screen works, less code duplication

renamed app name in license comment
+ better handling of networks, and waking up when waiting on them

+ fixed some bugs in the checking-for-a-fit-network code, and added options for when the phone is roaming
